UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
FEDERAL EXTENSION SERVICE
WASHINGTON 25, D. C.
May 23, 1957
Dr. H. J. Skornia
Executive Director
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
119 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Skornias
I find that I do not have No. 10, Section IV, Audience
Studies, in ray file of Educational Television Research
Fact Sheet Service releases. If you have an extra copy
that you can send me I shall greatly appreciate receivÂ¬
ing it. This service is very helpful to me.
Sincerely yours,
1 , lyst
Teaching Methods Research Branch
